bug.author: willisjtc
bug.summary: Add Key Bindings for Gameplay Speed
bug.description: halite 1 allowed you to press 1,2,3,4,5 to change the game speed. It would be super nice to set that up this time as well

comments.comment: As another option, having a dropdown of some sort to quickly switch between speeds would be awesome. Just a thought too, I'd bet a lot of money that most people are using only a few of the speeds between 0.5 and 10 - I'd bet on 0.5 and 10 definitely, and probably 2-5 more fuzzily. I'd be fine if 7-9 are gone completely.
added the keyboard event so you can change the speed by pressing 1,2,3,4,5 on the keyboard
